titles.title: A joint resolution designating April 2, 1989, as "National Cleaning Professionals Recognition Day".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 8/4/1988--Introduced. Designates April 2, 1989, as National Cleaning Professionals Recognition Day.
